title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO PAY PRIOR YEAR OBLIGATION OF THE GENERAL SERVICES OFFICE THIS CY 2025 CHARGEABLE AGAINST THE SUPPLEMENTAL BUDGET OF GENERAL FUND PROPER FOR THE PAYMENT OF ELECTRICITY EXPENSES FOR GABALDON BUILDING AMOUNTING TO THREE HUNDRED SIXTY-THREE THOUSAND TWO HUNDRED NINETY-FIVE PESOS AND 04/100 (PHP 363,295.04).
